news.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
news.summary: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.

news.title: The FTC’s data-sharing order against GM is finally settled
news.summary: The order, first proposed a year ago, bans GM from collecting and then selling geolocation data to third parties, like data brokers and insurance companies.

news.title: India’s Emversity doubles valuation as it scales workers AI can’t replace
news.summary: Emversity has raised $30 million in a new round as it scales job-ready training in India.

news.title: Musk denies awareness of Grok sexual underage images as California AG launches probe
news.summary: The California attorney general has opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk's xAI after its chatbot Grok began generating nonconsensual sexual images of real women and even children.

news.title: OpenAI signs deal, worth $10B, for compute from Cerebras
news.summary: The collaboration will help OpenAI's models deliver faster response times for more difficult or time-consuming tasks, the companies said.

news.title: The best e-reader to buy right now
news.summary: Any ebook reader will let you cram a Beauty and the Beast-sized library’s worth of books in your pocket, but so will your phone. news.summary: Following the proliferation of the nonconsensual sexual deepfakes on X, the platform has detailed changes to the Grok account's ability to edit images of real people. news.title: The Stream Deck Plus is back to its lowest price
news.summary: If you’re looking for a simple way to streamline your workflow, the Elgato Stream Deck Plus is a handy productivity tool for automating everyday tasks. news.title: Verizon’s wireless network is down for many people nationwide
news.summary: The first big outage of 2026 is here, as Verizon customers across the US, including several of our phones, complain that service has been spotty or nonexistent starting at around noon ET, with phones switching to SOS Mode and being unable to connect. news.title: Naya Connect is a modular mechanical keyboard system for the indecisive
news.summary: Naya has already shipped one successful Kickstarter for a weird keyboard. The Naya Create was an ergonomic split deck with four swappable controller addons: a touchpad, a trackball, a rotary encoder, or a 6DoF spatial mouse. news.title: A British redcoat’s lost memoir resurfaces
news.summary: Shadrack Byfield lost his left arm in the War of 1812; his life sheds light on post-war re-integration.

news.title: Musk and Hegseth vow to “make Star Trek real” but miss the show’s lessons
news.summary: AI weapons systems may annihilate their creators.

news.title: SC measles outbreak has gone berserk: 124 cases since Friday, 409 quarantined
news.summary: On Jan. 6, there were 211 cases. The outbreak, which began in October, is now at 434.

news.title: A single click mounted a covert, multistage attack against Copilot
news.summary: Exploit exfiltrating data from chat histories worked even after users closed chat windows.

news.title: I can’t stop shooting Oddcore’s endless waves of weird little guys
news.summary: Zippy action, fun upgrade system make for a great pick-up-and-play shooter.

news.title: Two Thinking Machines Lab Cofounders Are Leaving to Rejoin OpenAI
news.summary: The departures are a blow for Thinking Machines Lab. Two narratives are already emerging about why they happened.

news.title: Tech Workers Are Condemning ICE Even as Their CEOs Stay Quiet
news.summary: The killing of George Floyd in 2020 prompted a wave of statements from tech companies and CEOs. Today, pushback against ICE is largely coming from employees, not executives.

news.title: Neuroscientists Decipher Procrastination: A Brain Mechanism Explains Why People Leave Certain Tasks for Later
news.summary: New research has discovered that a neural circuit may explain procrastination. Scientists were able to disrupt this connection using a drug.

news.title: Save Big on One of Our Favorite Desk Lamps from Lume Cube
news.summary: Lume Cube has a variety of marked-down lighting products to help revamp your home office.

news.title: AI’s Hacking Skills Are Approaching an ‘Inflection Point’
news.summary: AI models are getting so good at finding vulnerabilities that some experts say the tech industry might need to rethink how software is built.
